page.title: 10Mobile Shops & Services
page.content: Warcop has quite a lot of services.A Ribble bus comes round once a week on Tuesday.Bells van comes round once on Tuesday afternoon.Bells van sells bread and groceries.Birkets van comes round twice a week on Tuesday and Friday.Birkets sell groceries and bread too.There are three fruit vans that come once a week.The library van comes round once a fortnight and the school borrows books from it.It comes to school once a term.So we have enough time to read the books we have got.Mr Fisher is the window cleaner and comes on call when required.The butchers van comes round the Village once a week.The video van comes round once a week on Tuesday. The bus service is going to be cut and this will make it difficult for people to go shopping in Appleby.
